verbs.description: [V: slap] [ARGM-MNR: happy] [ARG0: one doctor] wants to smack your chronic pain away slapping and prodding might not be what first comes to mind when considering treatments for chronic pain but a local physical therapist is demonstrating his unique technique to the public this weekend pain andrew bloch washington blochs pain arthritis relief center colonel john fenzel national rehabilitation network wtop chronic pain dr terrence sheehan army post newsweek stations adventist healthcare rehabilitation westfield montgomery mall bloch pain arthritis relief center chief medical officer bethesda maryland retired army special forces maryland county
